name: Zeeshan Ali
event_review: That was awesome. It was a great opportunity for me to be there and learned a lot.
answer1: Forking is just containing a separate copy of the repository and there is no command involved. Cloning is done through the command 'git clone' and it is a process of receiving all the code files to the local machine.
answer2: A pull request is you requesting the target repository to please grab your changes. A ush would be the target repository requesting you to push your changes.
